dataList.name: 群体攻击
dataList.desc: 同时选取2个及以上敌人作为目标。

dataList.name: 强壮
dataList.desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 迅捷
dataList.desc: Speed increases by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 忍耐
dataList.desc: Defense skills gain final Power by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 虚弱
dataList.desc: Attack skills lose final Power by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 束缚
dataList.desc: Speed decreases by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 易损
dataList.desc: Take more damage from skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: Shock
dataList.desc: Take more damage by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 烧伤
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency, then halve it.

dataList.name: 流血
dataList.desc: When attacking, take fixed damage equal to (Potency)% of current HP, then halve it.

dataList.name: 标记
dataList.desc: Targeted by the character with the Passive [Sharp Shivs].

dataList.name: Compulsion (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, self-apply 2 Haste and 2 Fragile.

dataList.name: Compulsion (Panic)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, lose 10 HP.

dataList.name: Outlash (Low Morale)
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Self-apply 2 Attack Power Up and 2 Fragile

dataList.name: Outlash (Panic)
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, a random ally loses 20 SP.

dataList.name: 充能
dataList.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects. Its Count can go up to 20. It lowers by 1 at the end of each turn.

dataList.name: Ongoing Damage
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 强壮
dataList.desc: Attack skills gain final Power by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 守护
dataList.desc: Take less damage from skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 伤害提升
dataList.desc: Deal more damage with skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 防御提升
dataList.desc: Defense increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: Plus Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Plus Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: Minus Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Minus Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: Multiply Coin Boost
dataList.desc: Raise the Power of Multiply Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 破绽
dataList.desc: Defense skills lose final Power by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 虚弱
dataList.desc: All skills lose final Power by the effect’s Potency for one turn.

dataList.name: 伤害降低
dataList.desc: Deal less damage with skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 防御降低
dataList.desc: Defense decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 麻痹
dataList.desc: Fix the Power of X Coin(s) to 0 for one turn.

dataList.name: Plus Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Plus Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: Minus Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Minus Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: Multiply Coin Drop
dataList.desc: Reduce the power of Multiply Coins by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 月光
dataList.desc: Resource used by certain skills for additional effects.

dataList.name: 愤怒
dataList.desc: Spent by certain skills. Required for the use of certain skills.

dataList.name: 无法行动
dataList.desc: Does not act for the turn.

dataList.name: 烧伤
dataList.desc:
At the end of the turn, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: 流血
dataList.desc:
When tossing an attack Coin, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: 动摇
dataList.desc:
When attacked by skills that burst Tremor, raise the Stagger threshold by the effect’s Potency.
At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

dataList.name: 爆破
dataList.desc:
When hit by an attack, take fixed damage by the effect’s Potency.
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: 沉沦
dataList.desc:
The next {1} time(s) the unit is hit by an attack skill, take {0} fixed SP damage. (Applies as Gloom-affinity damage to Abnormalities)
Then, reduce its Count by 1.

dataList.name: 呼吸法
dataList.desc:
On hit, gain a Potency-based chance to deal critical damage, reducing the Count by 1 if successful.
At the end of the turn, reduce the Count by 1.

dataList.name: 血囊
dataList.desc: Use a powerful attack after the Count reaches a certain amount.

dataList.name: 液囊
dataList.desc: Gain healing proportional to the Count.

dataList.name: 迅疾
dataList.desc: This unit powers itself up after the Count reaches a certain amount.

dataList.name: 不知所措
dataList.desc: Cannot act for one turn. When hit, flees battle after the attacker’s skill has finished.

dataList.name: 手术
dataList.desc:
Die when Potency reaches 5.
Reduce Max HP by 20% (per Potency).
Deal 20% (per Potency) more damage.
At the start of the turn, self-apply Haste by the effect’s Potency.

dataList.name: 紧急手术
dataList.desc:
Boost Max HP by 25% and skill Power by 1 per this effect’s Potency.
Each turn, increase this effect’s Potency by 1.
Die when Potency reaches 5.

dataList.name: 粉色绸带
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if at 5+ Potency, remove this effect and apply ‘Desirous’ next turn.

dataList.name: 渴望
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, self-apply 10 Bind.
All phys. resistances change to ‘Fatal’.
Attack Skill Power +2.
Defense Skill Power -2.

dataList.name: 粉色绸带
dataList.desc:
Count increases by 1 whenever the affected unit tosses an attack skill Coin.
At the end of the turn, inflict Bind by the effect’s Count, then remove this status.

dataList.name: 蛆虫
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, take Gluttony damage by the Count, increase Bleed Count by 1, then reduce this effect’s Count by 1.

dataList.name: Offense Level-up
dataList.desc: Offense level increases based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: Offense Level-down
dataList.desc: Offense level decreases based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 坚如泰山
dataList.desc: When attacked, inflict +1 Burn Count to the attacker.

dataList.name: 斩击抗性提升
dataList.desc:
Increase Slash Resistance by a % based on Potency.
(0.1% per Potency)

dataList.name: 突刺抗性提升
dataList.desc:
Increase Pierce Resistance by a % based on Potency.
(0.1% per Potency)

dataList.name: 打击抗性提升
dataList.desc:
Increase Blunt Resistance by a % based on Potency.
(0.1% per Potency)

dataList.name: 斩击伤害提升
dataList.desc: Deal more damage with Slash skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 突刺伤害提升
dataList.desc: Deal more damage with Pierce skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 打击伤害提升
dataList.desc: Deal more damage with Blunt skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 斩击伤害下降
dataList.desc: Deal less damage with Slash skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 突刺伤害下降
dataList.desc: Deal less damage with Pierce skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 打击伤害下降
dataList.desc: Deal less damage with Blunt skills based on the effect's Potency for one turn. (Max. 10)

dataList.name: 诅咒
dataList.desc:
Turn End: Self-apply 1 of the following, then reduce this effect’s Count by 1.
1 Attack Power Down/1 Defense Power Down/1 Offense Level Down/1 Defense Down

dataList.name: Weak-resist Damage Boost
dataList.desc: Boost the damage of attacks against Weak resistances by (Potency)%.

dataList.name: 子弹
dataList.desc:
Spent by certain skills.
Some attacks cancel if lacking Ammo.

dataList.name: Final Augmentation
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Gain 3 Attack Power Up, Defense Power Up, and Haste; Dies in 3 turns

dataList.name: Instincts
dataList.desc: At the end of the turn, if the Count is at 4+, change to an “aggressive” state.

dataList.name: Gaze of the One Who Grips
dataList.desc: Staggered for a turn. Take +100% damage from Kromer.

dataList.name: 中毒
dataList.desc: Turn End: Take fixed damage by the Count, then halve the Count.

dataList.name: 渴望
dataList.desc: Turn End: At 5+ stacks, take 30 SP damage, apply 2 Fragile and 10 Bind, and remove this status

dataList.name: 狂热
dataList.desc: Final Power +1 against units with Nails

dataList.name: 钉
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Apply 1 Bleed to self, and increase Bleed count by this effect's Count. Turn End: Reduce Count by 1.

dataList.name: 金光闪闪
dataList.desc: Turn Start: Heal 10 HP per Count.
